message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $130.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate the middle ground, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
